name: Send done Monday items to Facebook Conversions API
description:
This template periodically checks for new "done" items in Monday and sends them to Facebook Conversions API. 

The template expects your Monday board to have these columns:
1) Status as status
2) Email as text
3) "Sent to Facebook" as dropdown ("Yes","No")

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
